pages.text: When placed on a vanilla $(item)Spawner/$, this item $(thing)agitates/$ the Spawner:$(li)The spawner will keep spawning while no player is near$(li)It prevents spawned entities despawning when players leave the area$(p)Mob farm anyone?$(p)$(thing)Sneak-right-click/$ with a $(l:tools/logistics_configurator)Logistics Configurator/$ or another agitator to remove it.
